means: 政治局（共产党的中央执行委员会）

sentence.Network_en: The Politburo has been meeting in Peking to discuss the situation.
sentence.Network_cn: 政治局已在北京召开会议讨论形势。

sentence.Network_en: The politburo now found itself suffering a morbid embarrassment.
sentence.Network_cn: 政治局现在发现自己正遭受着一种可怕的折磨.

sentence.Network_en: He was getting his first experience of international contact at Politburo Level.
sentence.Network_cn: 他获得了在政治局层次上进行国际交往的初步经验.

apotheosis of this is a speech , by a member of the Chinese politburo , which goes on , unedited , for ten whole pages .典型的一个例子就是，中共政治局一名成员未经修订、长达整整十页的发言稿。
new central committee will elect a new 18 politburo members , including the new term cpv general secretary .新一届中央委员会定于18日选举新的中央政治局成员，包括新一任越共中央总书记。

derivation.yuyuan_name: from Russian politbyuro, from polit(icheskoe) byuro 'political bureau'

entry.def: In communist countries the Politburo is the chief committee that decides on government policy and makes decisions.

example.ex: The Politburo has been meeting in Peking to discuss the situation.
example.tran: 政治局已在北京召开会议讨论形势。

means.word_mean: 1. the chief executive and political committee of the Communist Party
